docs.snippet: Wayne Rooney provided a timely reminder to Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal that he can be a prolific Premier League goalscorer after he netted a brace in a 2-0 win against Sunderland to help United go third....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney provided a timely reminder to Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal that he can be a prolific Premier League goalscorer after he netted a brace in a 2-0 win against Sunderland to help United go third.

headline.main: Rooney Provides Timely Reminder of United Worth
headline.print_headline: Rooney Provides Timely Reminder of United Worth

docs.snippet: Anthony Mason's game was grit over glitz, more force than flash....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anthony Mason's game was grit over glitz, more force than flash.

headline.main: Anthony Mason, Rugged Forward of 1990s Knicks, Dies at 48
headline.print_headline: Anthony Mason, Rugged Forward of 1990s Knicks, Dies at 48
